main event: A former German guided missile expert reported seeing a white point moving from South to North at an altitude of 14 kilometers in Berlin on May 28, 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as a white point that was rather fast,It was observed at a height of 14 kilometers,The sighting was made in Berlin, Germany,The object had no sound and left no exhaust trail,There were no photographs or sketches included in the report.
